_A_SCREENREADER_SR_ONLY_DESCRIPTION_: Visually hides the element while keeping it available to the screen reader.
_A_SCREENREADER_SR_ONLY_FOCUSABLE_DESCRI: Visually hides the element and keeps it available to the screen reader, but shows it when the element or any of its descendants receives focus.
_A_SCREENREADER_TABLE_DESCRIPTION_: Classes visually hide elements but keep them available to the screen reader.
